item.description:
The CREATURE-CREATION SHOW, an annual multi-media performance-art spectacle featuring extraordinary foam-rubber creature-characters constructed by students in the RISD Creature-Creation Wintersession course, presents its surreal fusion at 8pm, Sat & Sun, March 5 & 6th 2011 at the RISD Auditorium, S Main Street, Providence, RI. Admission is $1.

Dr Tremendanus, Intergalactic Creature-Expert, returns as host and narrator, accompanied by professional musicians and performers from the Providence Artistic community and the BIG NAZO LAB.

THE AUDITORIUM IS ALSO ON S. WATER ST.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a bright green coat!
item.why: Its $1 to get in.......this is the culmination of the RISD Wintersession Creature Creation Studio - darn kids! They get all the fun!
item.name: Providence Collective - FYI: BIG NAZO - TONIGHT at the RISD Auditorium, 8PM!
